Class MilestoneCreator

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class MilestoneCreator
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.bradrydzewski.gwt.calendar.client.event.TimeBlockClickHandler<java.util.Date>

It execute the method onTimeBlockClick when a cell of calendar is clicked. Check that click was double and execute logic to create the new milestones, update display milestones and update display desired milestone.
